website_summaries.verdict: Rectangular style of the lenses in these sunglasses looks sharp. Specifically designed to ensure great fit.
pros: All-plastic design of lenses and frame works well for a lightweight fit
Offered in more than a dozen different lens colors, which allows you to personalize these sunglasses
Uses Oakley's Three-Point Fit to ensure a proper fit for most people
Offered at a low price point for Oakley sunglasses
cons: The plastic used in these sunglasses feels a little flimsy and may not last over time

customer_reviews.title: When I first got these I absolutely loved them. The clarity was great great
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these I absolutely loved them. The clarity was great great. The fit wonderfully. After 2 months of wearing these the lens have some scratches and the right earpiece broke a tab off. This is very disappointing considering I normally spend $15 on glasses that I can get a year out of before they’re in this shape. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these but they didn't fit my face properly
customer_reviews.author: T.Shull

customer_reviews.title: the Lense makes things seem a little bit brighter on dull days. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, the Lense makes things seem a little bit brighter on dull days. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shades greater price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sunglasses at an greater price. You can’t find a better value for polarized Oakley shades anywhere that are authentic!!! I will buy again if anything happens to these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are really nice quality polarized glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loves them. They are really nice quality polarized glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Perry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are a lot larger than they look in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great deal! Perfect packaging and legit product. A++
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: strange fit and poor quality. Oakley quality has gone way downhill since ...
customer_reviews.text: strange fit and poor quality. Oakley quality has gone way downhill since Luxxotica took over. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TattooedNurse

customer_reviews.title: These are OK but not great, expected a little more for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are OK but not great, expected a little more for the price. I bought them to play golf. However, they do not give me the relief from glare that I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He is very picky and was unsure about not trying them on before. He loves these glasses and he says I did a good job picking them out!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Thompson
